IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE EPISCOPAL ACTORS' GUILD OF AMERICA PROVIDES EMERGENCY AID AND SUPPORT TO PROFESSIONAL PERFORMERS OF ALL FAITHS UNDERGOING FINANCIAL CRISIS. WE ARE ALSO DEDICATED TO HELPING EMERGING ARTISTS ADVANCE THEIR CAREERS THROUGH SCHOLARSHIPS, AWARDS, AND PERFORMANCE OPPORTUNITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE EPISCOPAL ACTORS' GUILD PROVIDES EMERGENCY AID AND SUPPORT TO PROFESSIONAL PERFORMERS OF ALL FAITHS UNDERGOING FINANCIAL CRISIS. WE ARE ALSO DEDICATED TO HELPING EMERGING ARTISTS ADVANCE THEIR CAREERS THROUGH SCHOLARSHIPS, AWARDS, AND PERFORMANCE OPPORTUNITIES.
IRS990.Desc: THE EMERGENCY AID AND RELIEF PROGRAM - AWARD GRANTS TO QUALIFIED PERFORMERS IN FINANCIAL CRISIS REGARDLESS OF FAITH, RACE, ETHNICITY, GENDER, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, AGE, PHYSICAL ABILITY OR LANGUAGE. WE ADDRESS CRITICAL ISSUES SUCH AS EVICTION, HOUSING COURT STIPULATIONS, UTILITY SHUTOFFS, EMERGENCY, MEDICAL, AND DENTAL COSTS, AND SUSTENANCE NEEDS LIKE FOOD AND TRANSPORTATION.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE HIV/AIDS PROGRAM ADDRESSES THE SPECIFIC, AND OFTEN ONGOING, NEEDS OF PERFORMERS LIVING WITH THE DISEASE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: SCHOLARSHIPS ARE AWARDED TO RECOGNIZE EXCELLENCE IN THOSE STUDYING PERFORMING ARTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: ACTORS PANTRY PROVIDES PERFORMERS IN NEED WITH ACCESS TO FOOD, HOUSEHOLD ITEMS, AND OTHER SUNDRIES. OTHER PROGRAMS HELP PROMOTE COMMUNITY AWARENESS OF PROFESSIONAL PERFORMERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS WRITTEN GRANT GUIDELINES AND PROCEDURES THAT INCLUDE GRANTEE INTERVIEWS AND THE COMPLETION OF AN APPLICATION BY THE GRANTEE. ALL GRANT REQUESTS ARE REVIEWED BY THE GRANTS COMMITTEE.

THE EPISCOPAL ACTORS' GUILD PROVIDES EMERGENCY AID AND SUPPORT TO PROFESSIONAL PERFORMERS OF ALL FAITHS UNDERGOING FINANCIAL CRISIS. WE ARE ALSO DEDICATED TO HELPING EMERGING ARTISTS ADVANCE THEIR CAREERS THROUGH SCHOLARSHIPS, AWARDS, AND PERFORMANCE OPPORTUNITIES.
ACTORS PANTRY PROVIDES PERFORMERS IN NEED WITH ACCESS TO FOOD, HOUSEHOLD ITEMS, AND OTHER SUNDRIES. OTHER PROGRAMS HELP PROMOTE COMMUNITY AWARENESS OF PROFESSIONAL PERFORMERS.
THE OFFICERS AND COUNCIL ARE ELECTED BY MEMBERSHIP.
FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY A PERSON DESIGNATED BY THE GOVERNING COUNCIL WHO THEN RECOMMENDS TO THE COUNCIL FOR FILING AFTER THE REVIEW IS COMPLETED.
GUILD MEMBERS COMPLETE CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONNAIRES ANNUALLY AND ARE REVIEWED BY A PERSON DESIGNATED BY THE COUNCIL.

THE WARDEN, WHO IS ALSO A MEMBER OF THE GOVERNING COUNCIL, REVIEWS THE SALARY OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, WHICH IS THEN APPROVED BY THE COUNCIL. THE PROCESS INCLUDES REVIEWING SALARY SURVEYS AND OTHER RELATED MATERIALS.
GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST
